articles.title: Disney's putting Free Guy and Shang-Chi into actual theaters this fall, no Disney Plus or nothin' - The A.V. Club
articles.description: After a year that saw it adopt a hybrid release strategy for films like Mulan and the upcoming Black Widow, Disney has confirmed it's putting Ryan Reynolds' Free Guy and Simu Liu's Shang-Chi into theaters with no Disney Plus support.
articles.content: Its been a rough year-and-change for the theatrical window, that quasi-mystical arrangement between studios and theaters, designed to keep home video from (hypothetically) totally crushing the going-… [+1713 chars]

articles.title: Mally Mall Sentenced to Prison in Las Vegas Prostitution Case - Billboard
articles.description: Hip-hop music figure Jamal “Mally Mall” Rashid was sentenced Thursday (May 13) in Las Vegas to 33 months in federal prison for owning and operating a prostitution business disguised as an escort enterprise.
articles.content: Rashid exploited hundreds of victims through manipulation, rules and threats, the top federal prosecutor in Nevada said, encouraged victims to get tattoos of him to demonstrate their loyalty, and led… [+1902 chars]

articles.title: How Spiral Set Out to Make the Most Realistically Gross Saw Traps Possible - Gizmodo
articles.description: Spiral director Darren Lynn Bousman talks to io9 about how the Chris Rock Saw movie came to be, as well as his long history with the franchise and his quest to make this movie's Saw traps as realistically gross as possible.
